TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .

CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant was convicted of speculating in gold and sentenced to a term of imprisonment . In DATE his conviction was annulled as unlawful . Subsequently the applicant instituted civil proceedings , seeking various kinds of compensation for his unlawful conviction and punishment .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( GPE районний суд PERSON області ) awarded the applicant CARDINAL hryvnyas ( ORG ) against ORG ( “ the Ministry ” ; ORG ) in compensation for his loss of income while in detention .
CARDINAL . This judgment became final and on DATE the bailiffs instituted enforcement proceedings . They submitted the enforcement writ to ORG , which redirected it to ORG ( ORG ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE the enforcement writ was returned to the applicant unenforced .

CARDINAL . On CARDINAL DATE ORG awarded the applicant ORG DATE against ORG ( “ the ORG ” ; PERSON казначейства в Хустському районі PERSON області ) in compensation for the gold confiscated from him following his conviction . This decision became final .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG informed the applicant that it could not make the payment without the command of the bailiffs . In connection with this , ORG had transferred the applicant 's request for enforcement and a copy of the judgment to the bailiffs and had requested ORG to transfer the enforcement writ thereto .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG informed the applicant that it had never issued the enforcement writ as the applicant personally had never requested the court to do so .
CARDINAL . The judgment of CARDINAL DATE remains unenforced .
CARDINAL . On DATE the GPE ORG awarded the applicant ORG CARDINAL against ORG in moral damages for a delay in the enforcement of the judgment of DATE .

CARDINAL . NORP This decision became final in DATE and on DATE the enforcement proceedings were instituted . On several occasions the ORG informed the applicant that the judgment award could not be paid on account of the lack of budgetary allocations .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( “ the ORG ” ; GPE суд GPE області ) gave the applicant , who sought to obtain a higher amount of compensation , leave to appeal against the judgment of DATE out of time .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG , following the applicant 's appeal , reviewed the facts of the case in their entirety and quashed the judgment of DATE . The court rejected the applicant 's claims against the ORG as lacking statutory basis under domestic law . On DATE ORG rejected the applicant 's request for leave to appeal in cassation .

CARDINAL . The applicant made several unsuccessful attempts to institute civil proceedings against various authorities , seeking compensation for the delays in the enforcement of the judgments in his favour .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law is summarised in the judgment of PERSON v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL , § § CARDINAL , DATE ) .
